SEARCH
Package repository

Class AppointmentRepository

Object
AppointmentRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
Repository<Appointment,String>
public class AppointmentRepository extends Object implements Repository<Appointment,String>
AppointmentRepository is a singleton class that manages the collection of appointments. It allows for saving, finding, deleting, and querying appointments based on various criteria such as patient, doctor, date, and status.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static AppointmentRepository getInstance()
      Gets the singleton instance of the AppointmentRepository. If the instance does not exist, it is created.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of the AppointmentRepository.

    • generateAppointmentId

      private String generateAppointmentId()
      Generates a unique appointment ID by incrementing the nextAppointmentNumber. The ID is in the format "A#####".
      Returns:
      A unique appointment ID.

    • save

      public Appointment save(Appointment appointment)
      Saves the provided appointment to the repository. If the appointment does not have an ID, a new ID is generated.
      Specified by:
      save in interface Repository<Appointment,String>
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment to be saved.
      Returns:
      The saved appointment, now with an ID if it did not have one.

    • findById

      public Optional<Appointment> findById(String id)
      Finds an appointment by its ID.
      Specified by:
      findById in interface Repository<Appointment,String>
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the appointment to find.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the appointment if found, or an empty Optional if not found.

    • findAll

      public List<Appointment> findAll()
      Finds all appointments in the repository.
      Specified by:
      findAll in interface Repository<Appointment,String>
      Returns:
      A list of all appointments.

      Specified by:

      Returns:

    • getAppointmentCountsByStatusForDoctor

      public Map<AppointmentStatus,Long> getAppointmentCountsByStatusForDoctor(Doctor doctor)
      Counts the number of appointments by status for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The doctor whose appointments are to be counted by status.
      Returns:
      A map where the keys are appointment statuses and the values are the counts of appointments with each status.

    • cleanupOldCancelledAppointments

      public void cleanupOldCancelledAppointments(LocalDate before)
      Deletes all cancelled appointments older than the specified date.
      Parameters:
      before - The date before which cancelled appointments should be removed.

    • isDoctorAvailable

      public boolean isDoctorAvailable(Doctor doctor, LocalDateTime dateTime)
      Checks if a specific doctor is available for an appointment at a specific date and time.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The doctor whose availability is to be checked.
      dateTime - The date and time to check for availability.
      Returns:
      true if the doctor is available at the specified date and time, false otherwise.
